channel.title: Badly Drawn Boy
channel.itunes:subtitle: Born In The UK Podcast
channel.itunes:author: EMI Records
channel.itunes:summary: As Badly Drawn releases his fifth studio album how do you write an album that encompasses your whole life and what strange memories does it bring to mind? Find this out and a whole lot more, in three 'Born In the UK' podcasts.

item.title: Badly Drawn Boy - part 1
item.itunes:author: EMI Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Born In The UK Podcast part 1 of 3
item.description: Having written an album that he didn't like a year ago, Badly Drawn Boy talks about what he had to do to turn this around. How do you write a song that encompasses your whole life and what strange memories does the album bring to mind? Find out in the first of three 'Born In the UK' podcasts from Badly Drawn Boy.
item.itunes:keywords: badly drawn boy,born in the UK,12 media,indie,rockfield studios,manchester

item.title: Badly Drawn Boy - part 2
item.itunes:author: EMI Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Born In The UK Podcast part 2 of 3
item.description: We travel to South Wales to get under the skin of Badly Drawn Boy. Hear the Manchester born artist talk about the stories behind the songs 'Welcome To the Overground' and 'If I Can Walk You Home Tonight', and find out why the artist feel so at home at Rockfield Studios.
item.itunes:keywords: badly drawn boy,born in the UK,12 media,indie,rockfield studios,manchester

item.title: Badly Drawn Boy - part 3
item.itunes:author: EMI Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Born In The UK Podcast part 3 of 3
item.description: What's music all about? What makes people want to buy your album? In the last episode, Badly Drawn Boy answers those questions, as well as talking about the feelings that releasing his fifth album brings about. Also, hear the songs 'Promise' and 'Last Dance', taken from Badly Drawn Boy's Born In the UK album.
item.itunes:keywords: badly drawn boy,born in the UK,12 media,indie,rockfield studios,manchester
